Meanwhile, Jin and Peng end up on their own creature mission of sorts. Eventually the crew reunites, and together they are able to return Taisui and end the loop.

He works out that the new stickers that PatPat gave to the the animals are made out of glow in the dark paper. That's what's been upsetting them all! By using the tracking device on Alf's phone and deputising the kids to be act as “special delivery deputies”, Pat is eventually able to locate Alf and the runaway sheep! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot “Qilin” and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season 1. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2
programme.desc: Daniel pulls out all the stops in an effort to recruit new students to Miyagi Do. Johnny reflects on some of the major relationships in his life - and responds to Daniel’s promotional efforts with his own.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2
programme.desc: Daniel makes another attempt to promote Miyagi Do, and receives guidance in a familiar form. Johnny grows suspicious about Kreese’s backstory. A new Cobra Kai student challenges Miguel and befriends Aisha, while Robby revisits a past he’d rather forget.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3

programme.title: How To Survive A Shark Attack
programme.desc: Shark attack survivor Paul De Gelder attempts the unthinkable -- provoking sharks to attack him and rip off his limbs so that he can reveal what it takes to survive an attack.

programme.title: Enter the Girl Dragon
programme.desc: A big fan of Bruce Lee, Pooja practises jeet kune do to become a skilled martial artist. She is so obsessed with Bruce Lee’s wisdom and martial arts technique that she loves him more than her boyfriend, Neel. However, when Neel is kidnapped by the mafia, she must fight them to save him.

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3

Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S1)
programme.desc: Monkey glands for immortality, hypnotised assassins, and a brain-linked cyborg couple. We investigate some of the strangest experiments on record. From two-headed dogs to testicle transplants...

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: All over the world are forbidden 'triangles' - mysterious regions where ships, planes, and people enter and then just disappear. They are found in Bermuda, Alaska, Japan and elsewhere. But why?

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: While an incredible new discovery is made in the triangle-shaped swamp, Rick Lagina and members of the team make shocking connections in Italy between the Knights Templar and the Oak Island mystery.

programme.title: Anghel Na Walang Langit
programme.desc: Vina Morales played two very demanding roles. Two women unrelated and who have never met, but looking very much alike, found their lives entertained when the people close to them mistook them for one another.

programme.title: Pagbabalik Ni Kumander Lawin
programme.desc: Don Jaime (Robert Tlabis) is still bothered by his brother's death although the killer, Renato Solidum (Dante Varona), is currently languishing in prison. Only Renato's death will satisfy him.

programme.title: Anak Ni Boy Negro
programme.desc: Nap never knew his father, and wanting to please his mother, he never bothered to find out anything about the notorious small time hood. But in his heart, he knew he deserved more than the shanty he grew up in.

programme.title: Puga
programme.desc: Willy (Rudy Fernandez) tags along with Mogan (Paquito Diaz) and Waldo (Ruel Vernal) when they escaped from prison. Outside, the three continue with their criminal activities to support themselves. Soon, Willy falls in love with Mogan's niece, Leonor (Cherie Gil). Can Willy turn the tables on Mogan and Waldo and bring them to justice instead?

programme.title: Dyesebel (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The retelling of the classic tale by the great Mars Ravelo. After years of hiding from a cruel, suspicious society on the land, mermaid Dyesebel (Charlene Gonzales) returns and falls in love with a man named Fredo (Matthew Mendoza).

programme.title: Tayong Dalawa
programme.desc: Sharon Cuneta teamed up with Gabby Concepcion in what is considered their best work together. Her coming to terms with her new, free lifestyle and how she cope with his former girlfriend, who refused to let him go is the gist of the movie.

programme.title: Diego
programme.desc: He is a member of an elite crop in the military. However,when his group decided to stage a coup against the government,he defied his head. What danger lurks in the jungle makes Diego a stark study of human fortitude and courage?

programme.title: Eseng Ng Tondo
programme.desc: FPJ played Eseng 45, a Manila policeman known for his proficiency with the 45 caliber gun. He was also known to be an honest and dedicated cop, the nemesis of evil in the crime-ridden area of Tondo.

programme.title: Bondying (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Jimmy Santos took on the role of one of the country's most beloved komik characters. Bondying, whose name has come to mean somebody immature or who never grew passed childhood.

programme.title: Eagle Squad (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Eight young men of different convictions, lifestyles and outlook in life banded together to become the Eagle Squad, an elite group of secret marshalls formed to counteract criminal elements in the city.

programme.title: Pintsik Haik
programme.desc: As a head of a small time general services, business and some illegal activity, Mando is satisfied enough on what they earned and share some blessings to the charity. But one day he was hired to rescue the father of May-leng.

programme.title: Bagets (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: In an age when life confuses more than it explains five teenaged boys come together and vow to uncover life’s mysteries and conquer the world. Witty, light-hearted coming-of-age movie about the joys and pains of growing up in these turbulent times.

programme.title: Kung Mahawi Man Ang Ulap (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The happy life of Hilda and her widowed mother, Gloria, changed for the worse when Eddie and his family moved in as their tenants. In no time at all, Gloria had gotten married to Eddie and was providing for his entire family. Still, she lived for the day when she would be able to reclaim what's rightfully hers.

programme.title: Anak Ni Baby Ama (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Baby Ama was a notorious hoodlum sent to the electric chair during the 60's. This movie is a fictionalized account of what life might have been for his son who came to this world already burdened with the memory of his father's life and death.
